div:
Introduction
This resource is a profile of ServiceRequest. It's ServiceRequest.code is bound to a value set of common Breat Radiology Exam recommendations. It is not meant to be a comprehensive list, just a common list.
The Breast Radiology Report contains references to zero or more recommendations, which may include ServiceRecommendation instances but is not limited to only ServiceRecommendation instances.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of how and where this resource is referenced.
Review Status
NotReviewed Comments and Suggested changes to this implementation guide van be made here
Profile Fragments
The following are the fragments that are included in this profile. This is included for developers use to understand the hierarchy and commonality of disparate profiles..
Header Fragment
